title: Milan’s Raw Power on Full Display in UAE Opener: Is He the Next Tour de France Sprint King?
content:
Hulking Lidl-Trek rider leaves lighter rivals in the dust on steep final ramp to strike first in the world championship of sprinters.

Read the full article at Milan’s Raw Power on Full Display in UAE Opener: Is He the Next Tour de France Sprint King? on Velo.
author: sstokes
